t: Amazon.com: Andis (Pet) 22690 EasyClip Pro-Animal 7-Piece Detachable Blade Clipper Kit,Purple
s: The blade does get quite hot after about 5-10 minutes of constant use so I do recommend frequently lubricating or buying a blade coolant spray, which Amazon carries. The Andis clippers are not any louder than any other brand you would get and my dog tolerates it well on her body and legs.
